Rank.Description: Increases your Dodge chance by 1%. Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to your melee weapon attacks by 1%.
Increases your Dodge chance by 2%. Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to your melee weapon attacks by 2%.
Increases your Dodge chance by 3%. Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to your melee weapon attacks by 3%.
Increases your Dodge chance by 4%. Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to your melee weapon attacks by 4%.
Increases your Dodge chance by 5%. Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to your melee weapon attacks by 5%.
Increases the damage of your Combo Point generating abilities by 2%.
Increases the damage of your Combo Point generating abilities by 4%.
Increases the damage of your Combo Point generating abilities by 6%.
Increases the damage of your Combo Point generating abilities by 8%.
Increases the damage of your Combo Point generating abilities by 10%.
You have a 100% chance to strike back at your enemy with both weapons when you block or dodge an attack.

Ability.Description: Deals 1018 to 1125 damage. Must be used after the Rogue has Blocked or Dodged. Awards 1 Combo Point.

Rank.Description: Your Quick Strike and Precision Strike increases the damage of your next Keen Strike or Binary Strike by 10%.
Your Quick Strike and Precision Strike increases the damage of your next Keen Strike or Binary Strike by 20%.
Deadly Dance now increases the damage of your next 3 Combo Point generating abilities by 5% per Combo Point spent. This bonus is applied only to attacks with melee weapons.
Deadly Dance now increases the damage of your next 3 Combo Point generating abilities by 10% per Combo Point spent. This bonus is applied only to attacks with melee weapons.
Deadly Dance now increases the damage of your next 3 Combo Point generating abilities by 15% per Combo Point spent. This bonus is applied only to attacks with melee weapons.
Increases the damage of your Finishers by 2%.
Increases the damage of your Finishers by 4%.
Increases the damage of your Finishers by 6%.
Increases the damage of your Finishers by 8%.
Increases the damage of your Finishers by 10%.
Increases your Dexterity by 2%.
Increases your Dexterity by 4%.
Increases your Dexterity by 6%.
Increases your Dexterity by 8%.
Increases your Dexterity by 10%.
Your Finishers cause Physical attacks to ignore 2% of your target's armor per Combo Point for 10 seconds.
Your Finishers cause Physical attacks to ignore 4% of your target's armor per Combo Point for 10 seconds.
Your Finishers cause Physical attacks to ignore 6% of your target's armor per Combo Point for 10 seconds.
Your Finishers give you 1 Energy per Combo Point.
Your Finishers give you 2 Energy per Combo Point.

Ability.Description:
Restores additional health per Combo Point over 12s.
1 Point: 1090 health 2 Points: 1341 health 3 Points: 1675 health 4 Points: 2092 health 5 Points: 2592 health

Rank.Description: Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to your offhand attacks by 7%.
Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to your offhand attacks by 14%.
Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to your offhand attacks by 21%.
Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to your offhand attacks by 28%.
Increases the Attack Power and Weapon Damage contribution to your offhand attacks by 35%.
Successful Critical Hits increase your damage by 3% and reduce damage taken by 1%.
Successful Critical Hits increase your damage by 6% and reduce damage taken by 2%.
Successful Critical Hits increase your damage by 9% and reduce damage taken by 3%.
Successful Critical Hits increase your damage by 12% and reduce damage taken by 4%.
Successful Critical Hits increase your damage by 15% and reduce damage taken by 5%.
Reduces the cooldown time of all Rhythmic Actions by 15 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown time of all Rhythmic Actions by 30 seconds.
Increases your maximum Energy by 5. Increases the damage of all Bladedancer abilities by 5%.
Increases your maximum Energy by 10. Increases the damage of all Bladedancer abilities by 10%.
Increases the damage of your Bladedancer attacks by 5%.
Increases the damage of your Bladedancer attacks by 10%.
Increases the damage of your Bladedancer attacks by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Rhythmic abilities by 3 seconds. You gain Blade Hustle every 3s, increasing the damage of your next Quick Strike or Precision Strike by 5%. Stacks up to 5 times unless consumed.

Increases the duration of your Rhythmic abilities by 6 seconds. You gain Blade Hustle every 3s, increasing the damage of your next Quick Strike or Precision Strike by 10%. Stacks up to 5 times unless consumed.

Increases the duration of your Rhythmic abilities by 9 seconds. You gain Blade Hustle every 3s, increasing the damage of your next Quick Strike or Precision Strike by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times unless consumed.

Ability.Description: Deals 5371 to 5937 over 6s with each weapon to up to 8 enemies. Grants immunity to crowd control to the Rogue. Allows movement.

Deals additional damage per Combo Point. Increases the chance for the enemy to be Critically Hit by 5% for a duration based on Combo Points.
1 Point: 938 damage, 20s 2 Points: 1201 damage, 30s 3 Points: 1553 damage, 40s 4 Points: 1992 damage, 50s 5 Points: 2519 damage, 60s

Rank.Description: Successful Critical Hits with Bladedancer abilities increase your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 2% per stack. Maximum 5 stacks. Lasts 30s.
Successful Critical Hits with Bladedancer abilities increase your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 4% per stack. Maximum 5 stacks. Lasts 30s.

Ability.Description: Deals 5371 to 5937 damage over 6s with each weapon to up to 8 enemies in a cone within 20 meters of the Rogue. Allows movement.
Increases movement speed by 15%. Reduces damage taken by 5%. Heals for 1% of Maximum Health every 2 seconds. Reduces Energy Regeneration Rate by 5/s. Toggled ability. Lasts until canceled.

Deals combined weapon damage plus additional damage per Combo Point.

Increases damage by 1% for each point spent in the Bladedancer soul.
